features.featureTitle: Add a search bar in the Header component, positioned near the hamburger menu button, that allows users to type product names. As the user types, the product grid on the Home page filters in real-time to show only matching products from the three available products (Foundation, Lip Gloss, Eyeliner). The search is case-insensitive and matches partial product names. If no products match, display a friendly 'No products found' message in the product grid area.
